calculateCumulativeScore(uint256).details: Calculates the cumulative score of a user.

claimReward(uint256,bytes32,address).details: Allows a user to claim their reward for completing a quiz.

completeQuiz(uint256,bytes32,uint256).details: Allows the owner to complete a quiz attempt.

returns._0: Whether the user is eligible for reward.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token used for rewards.

createQuiz(string,uint256).details: Function to create a new quiz.

params._quizHash: IPFS hash of the quiz content.

returns.quizId: Identifier of the newly created quiz.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

restartQuiz(uint256,bytes32).details: Allows a user to restart a quiz attempt.

startQuiz(uint256,bytes32).details: Function to start a quiz attempt.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: A smart contract that allows users to create quizzes and earn rewards for completing them. It allows the owner to manage quizzes, quiz metadata, and user activities.
